snippet.title: Eye 4 Eye - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
See exploration and investigation elements, and explore the 90s retro world of Eye 4 Eye in this trailer for the upcoming detective puzzle adventure PC game, as revealed during the Advanced Games Projects (AGP) Spotlight Show at USC Games Expo 2023.

In Eye 4 Eye, you are Detective Hazel, tasked with solving a case of the missing daughter of the wealthy, successful CEO of TempleTech. As you unveil the company's dark schemes, piece together an intricate mystery in a futuristic world brought to life in a captivating 90s retro aesthetic. Employ your cutting-edge ocular artificial implant and use tools like search engines, history vision, and item examination to journey down your investigative path. Engage your inner sleuth and challenge yourself with thought-provoking puzzles and enigmatic mysteries as you work to uncover the truth behind the missing girl.
